attributes.action: ensure english and scottish citizens, who contribute to the same tax pot in exactly the same manner, receive equality of treatment with regard to health, education and nursing home care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present all citizens of the U.K. are subject to the same levels of taxation, yet the treatment received by the English with regard to healthcare, University funding and nursing home care is fundamentally different to that received by the Scottish. Given the only difference is one of race this is discriminatory and should therefore be illegal.
